ddf.catalog.transformer.response.query.atom

Class AtomTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.transformer.response.query.atom.AtomTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryResponseTransformer

    public class AtomTransformer
extends Object
implements QueryResponseTransformer
    This is a QueryResponseTransformer that transforms query results into an Atom formatted feed.
    Atom specification referenced and used for this implementation was found at http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287

        public static final String REL_PREVIEW
